verses.name: Luke 12:40
verses.text: Be ye therefore ready also: for the Son of man cometh at an hour when ye think not.

verses.name: Luke 12:41
verses.text: Then Peter said unto him, Lord, speakest thou this parable unto us, or even to all?

verses.name: Luke 12:42
verses.text: And the Lord said, Who then is that faithful and wise steward, whom his lord shall make ruler over his household, to give them their portion of meat in due season?

verses.name: Luke 12:43
verses.text: Blessed is that servant, whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing.

verses.name: Luke 12:44
verses.text: Of a truth I say unto you, that he will make him ruler over all that he hath.
